name: Innova DeFi
description: Innova Starting A New Era Of DeFi In our digital world, trust, security, and efficiency are vital. Our Goals Initiating in a new era of DeFi applications for users and developers alike On-chain Security: On chain platforms using state of the art contracts. UX/UI: Simple no fluff platforms for ease of use. Decentralization: No private keys stored on servers that can be exploited. Transparency & communication: Hold project owners and developers accountable using INNOVASIGHT. Our Security & Transparency INNOVASIGHT is a state of the art contract that manages all funds accruded from taxes. When the team withdrawls fund the must provide the reason,receiver,address,amount,telegram at and the IPFS image of any chats. The community can view this at anytime in the dapp. Disappearing Devs NFT Collection A social-Fi experiment baked with passive ETH and INNOVA reflections.
